metadata.author: GitHub Copilot
metadata.errorType: TypeError: this.sortAppsOverview is not a function

description: Remove dead code that calls non-existent method this.sortAppsOverview() in AdminController. This method was never implemented; sorting is handled by AppsOverviewWorldClass.cycleSortOrder() instead.
rationale: The AdminController.openModal() method contains event listeners that call this.sortAppsOverview(columnName, index) but this method does not exist. This is residual code from an earlier implementation. Applications Overview now uses AppsOverviewWorldClass module with dedicated sorting functionality via cycleSortOrder(). Clicking table headers should not trigger a non-existent method.
impact: Removes dead code preventing TypeError when clicking table column headers. Sorting is properly handled by AppsOverviewWorldClass module which has dedicated UI buttons for sort control.

checks: Original code found in AdminController.openModal() method
Verify AppsOverviewWorldClass.cycleSortOrder() exists and is functional
AppsOverviewWorldClass module still intact and functional
No orphaned references to sortAppsOverview remain
Applications Overview sorting buttons still work via cycleSortOrder()

steps: 4. Click on table column headers - should NOT trigger errors
5. Use the dedicated 'Sort by Order' button at top of table
6. Verify sorting cycles through: none → ascending ▲ → descending ▼
7. Check console for no 'TypeError: this.sortAppsOverview is not a function' errors
8. Verify table data sorts correctly when using the sort button
